{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3274296,"name":"Jaclyn","username":"yapple","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/yapple/{size}/164719_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-06T20:18:17.734Z","cooked":"

Hello everyone, member of the Everybot team here. We found the following issue when assembling the chassis wheels.

The 2024 AM14U5 chassis comes with 10-12 X 1.5" thread forming screws vs the 2023 10-12 X 1.25" ones.

image950×433 102 KB

2023

2024

When assembling the center wheel there will not be enough room to have 6 bolts on both sides.

image844×527 86.9 KB

20240106_1405031920×1081 154 KB

20240106_1405031920×1081 154 KB

Currently we are going to try alternating 3 bolts per side but will wait for guidance from Andymark.
